title: Cross and passion
creator_credit: Claire Pollak, Kim Longinotto and British Film Institute
brief_description: The women of Northern Ireland tell their stories in this film shot in the troubled Catholic ghetto area of West Belfast. Shows how life for Women in Belfast’s ghettos is dominated by the contrasting power of the church and army.
